UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthesis of Second-Generation Analogs of Temporin-SHa Peptide Having Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial and Anticancer Effects
Literature.Author: Khan AI, Nazir S, Haque MNU, Maharjan R, Khan FA, Olleik H, Courvoisier-Dezord E, Maresca M, Shaheen F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human bronchial epithelial cells BEAS-2B:IC50=32.0±1.9 µM,Human Lung Fibroblasts IMR-90:IC50=38.2±1.5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii DSM 30007(MIC=12.5µM),Enterobacter cloacae DSM 30054(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=>100µM),Helicobacter pylori ATCC 43504(MIC=6.25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 26371(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>100µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=6.25µM),Enterococcus faecalis DSM 2570(MIC=12.5µM),Enterococcus faecium DSM 20477(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=6.25µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=13.1±3.6µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=40.3±7.2µM),Human ovarian adenocarcinoma A2780(IC50=23.2±3.1µM),Human pancreatic carcinoma Mia PaCa-2(IC50=23.9±3.9µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=19.3±1.2µM),Human skin melanoma MNT-1(IC50=44.1±8.1µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=22.0±2.1µM)
